item.title: Why Retail Hiring Is Expected to Drop to Its Lowest Level in Over a Decade
item.description: A new forecast from Challenger, Gray & Christmas expects retailers to hire fewer than 500,000 people for the year-end season, the lowest level since 2...

item.title: This Company Is Turning Empty Offices Across America Into Indoor Farms
item.description: Area 2 Farms is a three-year-old company based in Arlington, Virginia, that’s taking the concept of indoor farming to unusual spaces.

item.title: 4 Reasons the Real ROI of Freelance Talent Is More Than a Quick Fix
item.description: Using freelance talent isn’t just a temporary solution. It’s a strategic advantage that drives innovation, agility, and long-term growth.
